course_description: Database implementation as well as advanced database concepts and emerging database applications will be covered. Topics include: data storage and indexing, database recovery, transaction concurrency control, distributed databases, web data management, and database security and privacy.
sections: Class Nbr: 1898, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: J. Lu, Status: Open
